dimension: 5 1/4 x 3 1/4 x 1/8 in. (13.34 x 8.26 x 0.32 cm) (object part, central pendant only)
title: Headdress (talgamout)
description: large central pendant with 7 filigree balls with pendants; central design with 3 rectangular glass inlays and one diamond-shaped inlay; 2 top ornaments with red glass inlays and hanging pendants; yellow and blue enamel inlay
creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
